019
020import com.google.common.io.ByteArrayDataOutput;
021import com.google.common.io.ByteStreams;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
024import redis.clients.jedis.Jedis;
025import redis.clients.jedis.JedisPool;
026
027import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
028
029/**
030 * TNEJedisManager
031 *
032 * @author creatorfromhell
033 * @since 0.1.2.0
034 */
035public class TNEJedisManager {
036
037  private static TNEJedisManager instance;
038  protected final JedisPool pool;
039  protected final TNESubscriber subscriber = new TNESubscriber();
040  protected final byte[] channel = "tne:balance".getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
041  final Thread redisThread;
042
043  public TNEJedisManager(final JedisPool pool) {
044
045    this.pool = pool;
046
047    if(connectionTest()) {
048
049      redisThread = new Thread(()->{
050        try(Jedis jedis = pool.getResource()) {
051          jedis.subscribe(subscriber, channel);
052        }
053      }, "TNE Redis Thread");
054
055      redisThread.start();
056
057      PluginCore.log().inform("Redis Subscriber Thread Started on host", DebugLevel.OFF);
058    } else {
059      redisThread = null;
060    }
061
062    instance = this;
063  }
064
065  public static TNEJedisManager instance() {
066
067    return instance;
068  }
069
070  public static void send(final byte[] data) {
071
072    final ByteArrayDataOutput out = ByteStreams.newDataOutput();
073    out.writeUTF(PluginCore.instance().getServerID().toString());
074
075    out.write(data);
076
077    instance.publish(out.toByteArray());
078  }
079
080  public boolean connectionTest() {
081
082    try(Jedis jedis = pool.getResource()) {
083      jedis.ping();
084      return true;
085    } catch(Exception e) {
086      PluginCore.log().error("Redis Connection Test Failed!", e, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
087      return false;
088    }
089  }
090
091  public void publish(final byte[] data) {
092
093    try(Jedis jedis = pool.getResource()) {
094      jedis.publish(channel, data);
095    }
096  }
097
098  public void publish(final String channel, final byte[] data) {
099
100    try(Jedis jedis = pool.getResource()) {
101      jedis.publish(channel.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8), data);
102    }
103  }
104}
